example.code: PS C:\> Copy-EC2Snapshot -SourceRegion eu-west-1 -SourceSnapshotId snap-12345678 -Region us-west-2
example.description: This example copies the specified snapshot from the EU (Ireland) region to the US West (Oregon) region.

example.code: PS C:\> Set-DefaultAWSRegion us-west-2 PS C:\> Copy-EC2Snapshot -SourceRegion eu-west-1 -SourceSnapshotId snap-12345678
example.description: If you set a default region and omit the Region parameter, the default destination region is the default region.
